Maya looked up at them with a shocked look on her face. “Me?! Model?!”

“Oh, why not?” Cora said. “Oh, we are always looking for fresh faces and you’ve got a build several of our more experienced models would die for.” She paused as she remembered what happened to Shell Ulite. “Forget that last phrase I used. But modeling would be perfect for you.”

“But I don’t even know how to model. The only jobs I’ve had are being a legal aide and a spirit medium. That stint as a waitress doesn’t even count.”

“Oh, but modeling is easy. We’ll just figure out poses and shots as we go along.”

“And I’ll be taking the pictures!” Lotta said. “Ya got nothing to worry about.” Maya didn’t know if that was supposed to make her happy or scared.

“You’re a spirit medium, right?” Cora asked. She tilted her head to one side in thought. “We still have that set from the Japanese garden shoot. A few modifications and we could dress it up in a spirit medium/occult theme. Oh, and we have a bunch of beautiful robes that you could wear.”

As a young girl Maya had thought it would be cool to be a model and have hundreds of pictures taken of her. That old desire had finally climbed through a mountain of flab into her brain. She grinned. “Sure, it sounds cool!”

Cora led her into a dressing room that was painted in pink and had a rack of fabulous clothes, plump couches, a full length mirror, and a big mirror on a table covered with makeup and sub sandwiches. “Just put on whatever you like first, and then come on out. We should be ready with the set by then.”

Maya shuffled through the clothes on the rack. “Oooohhh…” She held up a purple and black robe that must have been made out of very expensive material. She changed outfits, making sure that the photos of Shelly’s stalker stayed hidden under the heap. She slipped on the skirt of the costume, which barely managed to fit around her waist, and latched it. The upper part of the robes covered her shoulders quite well, and a black piece of cloth covered her chest. But the folds of the robe were cut backwards and flared out behind her, leaving most of her belly exposed. Maya giggled at her appearance.

She waddled out the door onto the set, which had undergone changes very quickly. The tradition plants and stone statues remained, but the lighting was much darker. Neon lights were set up in the back, as well as colored blotches made by spotlights that must represent spirits. And a huge glowing Magatama dominated the backdrop.

Cora marveled at Maya’s appearance as she waddled in. “Oh Maya, you look absolutely gorgeous! Now, Lotta will just be taking pictures and I’ll talk you through a few poses, okay? Just relax and have fun. We’re going to have to give you a pseudonym and a catchphrase. Hmm…”

Lotta piqued up from the camera. “How about Mystic Maya: Extra Large and Extrasensory?”

“Ooo, I like that one. It fits wonderfully!”

Maya as a little nervous at first, but once she got over her initial jitters she modeled quite well. She went through many poses including a sexy stance showed off her girth; back-over-the-shoulder as she leaned on a statue, her massive butt pointed at the camera; seductively lying on a reinforced bench, every single one of her curves highlighted; and various other poses.

“Maya, you’re a natural at this.” Cora said. “Find a different outfit, something a bit brighter.”

Maya returned to the dressing room and changed into a brilliant red furisode with woven yellow symbols that were stretched by her belly. Although this time she was fully clothed, the tight fabric hugged every roll and lump of her body, with a low cut on the neckline that half-covered her breasts. This costume got an even better response from Cora and Lotta.

“Oh, we really have to do something with those long, hanging sleeves. Try some mystical arm movements,” Cora suggested.

Maya gestured with her hands. “Ole! Ole!”

Lotta laughed. “You’re not a bullfighter, Maya. You’re so much bigger than the bull, he’ll die of fright when he sees you.” They all cracked up at that.

A while later, after several hundred pictures and a score of revealing to accentuating, dazzling to gothic robes, Maya was taking a break in the dressing room. She now wore a striking red and orange flame patterned robe with a bright orange obi long enough to fit around Maya’s waist, although it fit snugly. The robe was open, as Maya wore a white under tunic that supported her breasts and cut off at her thighs. The robes were short, as the outfit was designed to leave plenty of chunky leg to be seen.

Maya refreshed herself with a soda, and glanced around the dressing room. A thought in the back of her mind bothered her, but she couldn’t put her finger on it. Suddenly…

111232112222211112212.title: Justice for All!

1112321122222111122122.content:
Maya sighed. "Think, Maya, think!"

And so, she thought. She clapped her hands together as the idea hit her. She had been practicing how to project her spirit, and now was the perfect time to do so! She sat down in the middle of the street, attempting to sit cross legged, but her massive belly got in the way. She sighed and simply knelt, her belly nearly touching the ground as it covered her thunder thighs.

She closed her eyes and began to concentrate. Suddenly, she felt light. A lot lighter, due to the fact she no longer had an extra 500+ pounds to heave around. Grinning, she glance down. She was still huge, but, ectoplasm weighs a lot less that fat. Sighing, she floated over the city, searching for the courtroom. Seeing it, she grinned, and floated down. She drifted into the courtroom, a heated cross-examination with the witness occurring. Mr. Feedem looked fairly dazed. The case must not be going well. "Ask him about the alley!" Maya shouted at Nick.

Nick blinked and glanced around. "What... Maya?" He asked aloud, causing the entire courtroom to stare at him oddly. He chuckled, then heeded her advice. "Tell us about the alleyway, Mr. Feedem!" he said, pointing his finger at he man dramatically. The Judge seemed stunned. "A-alleyway?"
Nick nodded. "The alleyway."
Mr. Feedem blinked, remembering the event. He began to describe it exactly as the pictures had. The judge raised an eyebrow. "And do you have any evidence of this occurance?" Phoenix's face blanked and he began to sweat.
"Thanks alot maya."

Maya returned to her body, furious, when another idea came to her. She glanced around, and spotted a little kid. "Hey, kid!" She said, waddling to the stunned youngster. "Yeah?"
"I'll give you five dollars to run this to the courtroom. Give it to Phoenix Wright.Tell him Maya sent them." She said, handing him the photos and the letter. The kid grinned and nodded, snagging the items, and running to the court room.

"Oh god, I'm about to lose..."
"I declare the defendant... Gui-" The judge was interrupted by the door bursting open, a young boy dashing to Phoenix, demanding five dollars for something in his hands. "S'from Maya!"

Nick sighed and handed the kid some money, taking the file, and smirking. "OBJECTION!" He shouted dramatically, presenting the evidence. "TAKE THAT!"
1112321122222111122122.title: O.B.E (Out of BBW Experience)

11123211222221111221222.content:
“Er, what is this?” The judge asked.

“The defense has just received some evidence which could wildly affect this case. We wish to submit it to the record immediately!”

“But I was just about to procure a guilty verdict—”

“Not to worry, your honor,” Edgeworth interjected. “If new evidence has been found that will tip either side of the case, it is our duty as a court to examine it.” Edgeworth gave a smug look in Phoenix’s direction. “Honestly, Wright, I thought you had lost your touch, but once again you pulled the ace out of your sleeve at the last minute. You have that cat-swallowed-the-canary grin on your face again.”

“Ha ha ha…” Phoenix grinned embarrassedly. “Anyways, your honor, remember Mr. Feedem’s testimony about witnessing a confrontation in the alleyway of the HIPPO Magazine building?”

“Yes, we presumed it to be baseless testimony.”

“Wrong! The defense will submit these photographs as evidence.”

The judge looked them over. “Hmm…Oh my, this is a scary scene…boy, that one man looks familiar…”

“He should, your honor,” Phoenix groaned. You had to zap the judge with a cattle prod in order to get his brain moving. “That’s the defendant, rushing in to save the victim from her attacker.”

“Oh, so THAT’S what these photos show…”

“Mr. Feedem,” Phoenix continued. “I’m curious. Why would you rush in to protect some woman, you’ve never seen before in your life, from some mugger? As you can by these photographs, you can’t see the knife the stalker is holding. If you hand seen it, I’m sure you wouldn’t have risked your life protecting some woman you never knew. Yet you rushed in to protect this woman. Why? And why would you rush to the side of this woman days later when she ends up dead in a supermarket?”

“Um…er…” F.A. Feedem was getting red in the face.

“Spill the beans, Mr. Feedem. What is your connection to this woman? It’s because of this connection that you are now sitting in the defendants’ chair as her murderer. But from these photos it seems you wouldn’t want any harm to come to her. Why is that? What’s your connection to the victim?”

“Okayyy, I’ll tell you. I’m a FA, are you happy now? That’s way I’ve been trying to get in contact with the victim.”

There was silence in the court room for a moment. “Um…” the judge began. “You’ve been trying to contact the victim because of your initials?”

“No, I’m a FA. A fat admirer. To me, fat girls are the most beautiful things on the planet. I had been looking at pictures on the HIPPO Magazine website when I recognized Shelly as an old friend I grew up with during high school and college.”

“So you were really friends with the victim?”

“Well, not exactly. I just had this really big crush on her…”

“So you took a chance trying to reconnect with an old classmate,” Edgeworth surmised. “And that placed you under suspicion as being her killer.”

The judge looked confused again. “But this makes it sound like he would be the one stalking the victim.”

“Not so, your honor,” Phoenix added. “The defense has a second piece of evidence to submit. We believe that it will show that someone else had motive to kill Shelly Ulite.”

The judge looked at the letter he was handed. “‘If I can’t have you, no one should’? Voy Erst? Who is this Voy Erst?”

“It’s only a hunch, your honor,” Phoenix began. “But from everything we’ve heard up to this point, the defense suggests that Voy Erst is the disguised man in the photo, the man who was stalking Shelly Ulite with malicious intent and her real killer.”

“That’s quite the theory! Good job, Mr. Wright.” The judge banged his gavel. “If there is another suspect in this case, I want the prosecution and the defense to investigate it. Before I hand down a verdict, I want to be 100% convinced that Mr. Feedem is the real killer, or that someone else killed the victim. Court is adjourned.”

Phoenix walked through the courtroom lobby towards the doors. Edgeworth walked up beside him. “I had a feeling HIPPO Magazine was going to play a bigger part in this whole affair.”

“Maya’s still investigating over there, I think…” Phoenix still couldn’t shake the weird image of Maya’s spirit he seen in his mind’s eye. Phoenix headed down the courtroom steps, and was surprised that Edgeworth kept pace with him as he made a turn. “Are you coming with me?”

“Goodness, Wright. You know the next logical direction this investigation will take.” Edgeworth shrugged. “If the prosecution and the defense wind up in the same spot, that either means they are both equals in their ways of thinking or the defense simply wants to mooch evidence off the one lawyer who knows what he is doing.”

Hey! Phoenix thought. Who’s following who here?

“Hey pals, wait up.” Detective Gumshoe came running up behind them.

“Don’t tell me you’re coming along too, Gumshoe?”

“Chief wants me to check out the magazine. The rest of the investigation crew is still processing the supermarket. I didn’t mind volunteering at all!”

Whatever that’s supposed to mean, Phoenix thought.

“Well, look at us,” Edgeworth said. “Aren’t we the motley trio of the judicial system?”

Just what are we getting ourselves into? Phoenix thought, growing worried.

111232112222211112212221.content:
Stepping into the lobby of HIPPO magazine, the trio had a basic idea of what to expect and yet it was still came as one heck of a surprise.

The lobby was currently occupied by a throng of either full-figured, fat and plain out huge girls either chatting to each other happily or breaking for lunch, with several groups heading in the direction of the canteen or into the nearby food district. Many were already chowing down with gusto on the way to their meals. A number of them were also accompanied by very happy looking guys.

"This place makes me realise why Maggey is so tricky about her diet, pal." Gumshoe said quietly before he noticed Edgeworth being thronged by a group of large set young women.

"Desist at once, I am here on an urgent and official matter!" yelled a flustered and more than a little annoyed Edgeworth, causing the group to disperse to a series of disappointed sighs.

(Well Edgeworth seems to be enjoying the attention,) thought Phoenix (Better see if there's somewhere here who can help me...)

He spotted one happy looking couple as they were passing by, a man wearing sunglasses and a red cap with his arm round a giggling brunette whose rear and bulging belly seemed to be actively trying to escape from her clothing. Phoenix decided it would be rude to stare, then noticed they were both wearing staff badges.

"Excuse me, er... I don't suppose you've seen a dark haired girl, white and purple robes, going by the name Maya Fey?" he asked "Lately she's er, somewhat... on the chubby side."

(Though I suppose in here, that's not much of a distinguishing feature...) he reminded himself.

The man flashed him a huge grin.

"You mean the new girl? She left the building a little while ago, probably breaking for lunch early. A blossoming beauty like that has to keep herself healthy after all." The man lowered his voice and tapped the side of his nose "You're one lucky guy, ya know that?"

"What do you mean 'new girl', did she get a job without telling me? -and we're not-" began Phoenix but the couple were already through the doors and off to some nearby buffet.

"Well, Wright. Your assistant does not seem to be on the premises. I assume you plan on looking for her?" said Edgeworth

"I don't know, Maya has a habit of turning up where I am and besides, she's big enough to take care of herself." Phoenix replied "Then again, she does have a habit of getting herself into trouble when i'm not around..."

"Well if you do decide to search for her whereabouts, Detective Gumshoe and I will be sure to make a thorough sweep of the building." Edgeworth assured him "I have a gut feeling there is some vital evidence here yet to be found."

"Yeah, I get that too." said Phoenix, wearily "Well I guess i'll-

11211.content:
Phoenix returned shortly thereafter with a newspaper folded under one arm and a baker’s dozen of Dinkin’ Donuts, two cups of the same label balanced on top as he re-entered the Wright&Co. Law Firm. He struggled juggling all three, let alone opening the door, so Maya was more than happy to jump up and take one of them off of his hands. The young medium practically pounced upon the opportunity to get her hands on something nummy for her tummy.

“I’ll just take these off your hands, Nick!” Maya said devilishly as she ripped the box from the defense attorney, “Here, you can keep the coffee!”

“Wha—Maya!” the porcupine-headed man whimpered in confusion as the large box of donuts was stolen from him only to be replaced by two piping hot cups of coffee. Which of course he dropped as a small trickle of the heated brown liquid splashed out from underneath the protective plastic cap and into the crevice of his palm, creating a large stain on his signature outfit!

“OwOwOw that’s hot!” Phoenix cried out as the liquid seeped through his outer layers to scald his skin, “That’s really, really, REALLY HOT!”

“Oh my gosh, Nick!” Maya hollered after swallowing a bite of her precious breakfast, turning on a dime to face her injured boss (but not before making sure that the box in which her breakfast came in was securely placed upon the coffee table), “Are you alright?”

It’s a sad say when a box of donuts gets better treatment than I do around here. Phoenix thought to himself as he pat at his rapidly cooling torso, No respect I tell ya, no respect.

“I’m fine, Maya.” He said rather bitterly, “Just be more careful next time you endanger my life for baked goods!”

“I’m sorry!” Maya said, her hands folding behind her back as her head hung low, sniffling a little bit. Had Phoenix paid more attention to the physical well-being of his young assistant, he would have noticed a slight curvature to Maya’s physique—namely in the vicinity of her stomach. However he also would have noticed that she was hiding a donut behind her back. But he didn’t, so let’s move on.

“Oh jeez, not my blue suit…” Phoenix’s face twisted into a frown as he took in the sight of his damaged signature suit courtesy of a nearby mirror, “I was hoping to try and get a client today.”

“Can’t you just wear another one?” Maya almost sounded like she was begging, obviously she felt really bad about the whole ordeal, “At least until that one gets dry-cleaned?”

“What ‘other one’? I only wear this one outfit!” Phoenix exclaimed

“No offense Nick, but aren’t lawyers supposed to be rich and stuff?” Maya asked impishly as she returned the donut to her lips, “ You've only got one suit, we only get basic cable, heck you've still got a VCR! I think it’s time we took in a big client before General Electric starts shutting off lights!”

Don’t you live in a village on the outskirts of the country with little to no technological advances? Phoenix felt like asking, but he deemed it unworthy of pressing forward.

“OBJECTION! I just bought that DVD player two weeks ago! You even made me watch the Steel Samurai just last night!”

“OVERRULED, because that was the Nickel Samurai and you know you enjoyed it!” Maya giggled as she imitated her mentor’s signature stance, “And besides, I’m just saying maybe it’s a little inconvenient to only have that one suit. How have you been keeping it clean?”

Phoenix got quiet, his mouth shrinking down to a sliver, Th-This is my only set of lawyer clothes… I just get it dry-cleaned every week…

“Nevermind that now.” Phoenix adjusted his stained collar professionally, “Just hurry up and eat your breakfast so we can head down to the Laundromat.”

“Can we stop for burgers on the way?!”

“NO BURGERS UNTIL YOU FINISH YOUR DONUTS!!”

Maybe this is why I wouldn't make a good father…

In the end, Good old P.W. decided to treat Maya to O'Ronalds burger joint seeing as it was on the way to the laundromat and figuring that if there were to be more mustard and ketchup stains on his shirt (knowing the messy eater that Maya was,) than at least he'd get them before the laundromat rather than after, and get the most out of his money. An ambulance was now hurriedly zooming down the street, pulling into the O'Ronalds parking lot a short distance down the road.

The two quicken their pace, jogging down the block until stopping in front of the yellow and red colored restaurant. A group of police officers were now blocking of the entrance to the house of hamburgers with lines of yellow CRIME SCENE DO NOT CROSS tape. Phoenix at first grimaced at the familiar sight having invested many a crime scene before, then he suddenly smiled, this wasn't his problem today! "Well look at the Maya." he said practically whistling, "Looks like the place is closed off. Oh, well" and at this he was already starting to walk down the sidewalk again, "guess I'll have to treat you some other time..."

Maya did not follow him, instead she was already ducking her top knot under the police tape. "Oh, come on Phoenix" said the woman whose sense of adventure was one of the few things more powerful than her hunger. "Look I think I see officer Gumshoe let's just go say 'Hi.'"

"Maya wait!" cried out Phoenix but the kimono clad girl was already working her way up to the front door. Why can't I have one normal day? thought Phoenix begrudgingly following Maya. As he approached the restaurant's doors, Phoenix suddenly remembered why he specifically avoided the O'ronalds restaurant. A lone clown stature posed out front, frozen in place while posing with a cheeseburger. It really creeped him out! The wide eyes staring blankly at any passer by, the clowns makeup covered mouth open forever in a horrible grin scream. But that wasn't even the worst part-

"Let me go you whippersnapper! Half walking half being dragged the two officers handling her were having a hard time struggling with the (Septu-? Octo-? Nona-?) genarian. That, yes even that, was even sort of a normal sight for Phoenix these days, but what had really been the kicker was that today Wendy apparently was dressed completely as a clown, red rubber nose, makeup, and honking novelty horn in all. As he watched the crusty with age clown apparently still jabber as she was driven away by the police, Phoenix was suddenly startled by an angry voice shouting from behind him.

"Hey! Pal!" said the baritone voice causing Phoenix to jump a little in surprise. Turning around it was none other than Dick Gumshoe huffing and puffing as always and with a disgruntled look on his face. "Sorry but it's police only in there! Oh it's you!" The officers unshaven face seemed to lighten up a bit in recognition of Phoenix.

"Uh, hi Dick! Look I'm sorry about Maya. I'll get her and go...."

"Nah it's okay. Just don't touch anything s'all." said Dick holding the door open for his lawyer chum. (Why couldn't you be a little more strict as an officer?) Thought Phoenix giving up all thoughts of a normal day as he entered.
***


"Maya?" asked Phoenix entering the restaurant. "Phoeeeeeeniixxx" came the girl running up and nearly in tears. "Maya? What's wrong?" said Phoenix wrapping a consoling arm around the crying girl.

"It's terrible! Josie's dead!"

"Dead? Wait, who's Josie?" Maya pointed a finger to the only filled booth in the restaurant. Well filled with a corpse. Very Filled! Folded over, face first into the table an obese sized sable haired woman appeared to be dead. Her casaba melon sized breasts serving as a small almost comical cushion between her down turned face and the table. All around the collapsed corpse a collage of garbage including wrappers, ketchup packets and napkins remained strewn about the untouched booth.

"Yeah, officers already have a suspect down at the station." said Officer Gumshoe's voice abruptly and from behind them. "As well as two of the workers here a counter worker/grill worker, and...um the security guard." Dick's eyes rolled a bit remember having to wrangle up Wendy. "I...guess you can't exactly take any evidence yet, since you're not on the case yet. But I guess you can look around till Edgeworth get's here."

"Edgeworth! He's on the case already?" asked Phoenix his eyes turning to narrow slits at the thought of the smug pink clad prosecutor.

"Yeah but he hasn't been the to the crime scene yet and-"

"Never mind. Look I've got a funny feeling that if Edgeworth's on the case, I'll probably be hired for the defense." Explained Phoenix. "And who knows what evidence he will 'eveal dramatically in court. I should probably get as much information from the crime scene as I can, and fast!"

Now where to start. Phoenix turned about, taking in as much of the restaurant as he could, his mind now working at full speed to process as many details as it could. The watery eyed girl in front of him seemed like a good place.

"Maya you said you knew who this was?"

"Yeah! It's Josie Chestnut! World famous competitive eating champion three times in a row!"

"She's, one of my idols! I want to be a champion like her! Well, after a movie star, or the pink samurai, or an astronaut or-

P.W. zoned out as the girl began to ramble on. (Why am I not surprised. Maya already eats a ton, she might as well win an award for it. Speaking of awards...This lady sure looked like an eating champion! She probably would have had a-wait a minute..)

"Well when the original ambulance came for her, the noticed that her cheeks were strangely already blue. They took a blood sample and found traces of poison in her blood system."

"Poison! But how?"

"Well this is just from the initial report from the lab but it appears her body had been overdosed on sleeping pills. Which we also found on the suspect at the time of arrest...That's about all we know right now."

"Oh." said Phoenix glumly. He knew things weren't what they seemed when it came to cases like this but that wasn't a good start for the defense.

A sudden ringing emanated from the large police officer. It was the silver samurai jingle! Phoenix and Maya turned back to the copper who looked a little ashamed by the ringtone. but took out his cell phone regardless. "Yeah...Yes Mr. Edgeworth!...No they didn't move the body....Yes....I told him...Sorry..." A grim look overtook the gruff man as if he'd been thoroughly chewed out over the phone. Then spurts of smoke erupted through his nose, the officer now clearly getting worked up.

"Edgeworth?" guessed Phoenix.

"Yep, he said he's on his way." a dishevel Dick answered. "Dat' guy ain't even got the nerve to'- say thanks before hanging' up!" said an obviously angry Gumshoe.

"Well-just give a few minutes and we'll be out of here before he shows up." said Phoenix getting a little anxious himself. Not just from the thought of running into that damn Miles, but being stuck in the small restaurant with an angry officer Gumshoe.

He needed to get a leg up though...What could Phoenix do that Miles couldn't? Scanning the 'murder scene' for one last clue, Phoenix turned to Maya. Maya! Of course that was it! Miles didn't have a spirit medium and especially didn't have a member of the Fey family. He could get Maya to channel the spirit of the deceased Josie Chestnut and get as much info as he could.

"Maya, this is going to sound a little weird, and I know it's sudden but could you channel Josie's spirit for me?"

"What!" gaped the girl in plum colored clothing "Right now? Really?"

"Yes. I need to get as much info as I can before Edgeworth arrives."

"Well..I don't know if I can..." said Maya a little hesitant to summon the spirit of her idol on the spot.

"We'll go to the Kong Burger nearby for cheeseburgers..."

"Okay!" cheered the girl and once again approaching the corpse. Slowly she got into the focus, and the lights in the room seemed to dim a bit. Then the girls necklace, specifically her magical magatama, began to glow brightly. Maya had begun to mutter a few mystical words when-

"No, nothing is wrong. I just got back from out of the country. How have you been?" replied Lana, still maintaining her calm voice.

Ema breathed a sigh of relief. "Good, she didn't see me in that magazine." she thought. "Oh, I've been fine. Just...kind of going through some weird times right now" answered Ema with a bit of a laugh at her choice of words regarding what has happened in her life recently.

"Well, you can tell me all about them soon because I'm actually on my way to see you. I'll take you out to eat so maybe you can eat something for once." said Lana with a soft chuckle. "I'll be there in about 5 minutes so you should get ready. See you then." she finished before hanging up, leaving Ema in a bit of a panic.

"Oh shoot! What am I going to do? How am I going to explain all of THIS?!" screamed Ema, grabbing her gut and love handles and shook them for emphasis before resorting to what she always did when she got nervous: eating. She picked up the rest of her half-eaten sub and starting shoving it into her mouth as she waddled back to her bedroom to pick out something to wear since the plus-sized bathrobe she wore to get the mail from her mailbox right outside her apartment door won't do. She opened her closet, filled with outfits she either bought or took from her job and eventually picked out a light sweater with a knee-high skirt. Nothing she has could ever cover up the extra 200 pounds she put on, but at least Ema knows that since she just bought it yesterday, her stomach or any of her rolls won't poke out which was an inevitability as she kept gaining weight.

Just as she was finishing putting her clothes on, the doorbell rang.

"Just a second!" shouted Ema as she lumbered to the door, starting to get out of breath from her sudden rushing to and from her bedroom. She hunched over slightly to take a break before opening the door.

Outside was Lana, but she did look any different?
14212111.title: Siblings love to do the pop-in

choices: She got a job as a food critic
She just ate and stopped caring
142121111.content:
"E-Ema?!" gasped Lana upon seeing her little sister's new appearance.

"L-Lana?!" gasped Ema as well because she wasn't the only one that changed. Lana Skye also put a lot of weight!

Though Lana wasn't as fat as Ema was, but she stood in front of the doorway, weighing in at 230 pounds and decked out in a plain gray sweatshirt and matching pants that was a size or two too small. While Ema had most of her fat distributed into her stomach, the bulk of Lana's went to her hips, thighs and butt, causing her thighs to touch together while standing and the seat of the sweatpants to be a bit more strained than the rest of the pants. In fact, Lana's lower half was almost has large as Ema's despite being 80 pounds lighter. However, a large potbelly was sticking out of her clothes, her breasts were two cup sizes larger and Lana's face was puffed up with a second chin underneath her original one. In addition, there was a little smear of mustard on the left edge of Lana's lips.

"What happened to you?!" said both of the Skye sisters at once. "How did you get so-" they continued again at the same time.

"Wait, let's just have a seat and I'll explain first" said Ema. She turned around and waddled to the living room with Lana following her. The two sisters sat across from each other in chairs that could barely fit their bottoms. Ema grimaced, concluding that she'll have to use her bonus on larger furniture as soon as possible but went on to explain how at first, she ate out of depression but eventually stopped caring as much until she got too big for the police department.

"Though when I get nervous, I just want to eat until I can't take another bite." said Ema, then she patted her enormous gut and added "Which is taking longer these days." with a smile.

"What are you doing for work then?" asked Lana

"Oh, I got a job as a model for a magazine. I just got a bonus for breaking 300 pounds and I can keep some of the clothes from the shoots. In fact, I can lend you some of the clothes that don't fit me anymore if you want." answered Ema. "But what about you? How did you wind up like this?" she asked.

Why did Lana put on weight?
142121111.title: Yes, she put on a good amount of weight.

choices: Yes (and she considers doing more contests)
No, but she still wins something
142122.content:
Ema decided that trying the contest was worth going for the prize money. After all, she certainly had plenty of practice in eating herself into the right shape for a competition like that. She looked at the poster again and saw it was being held at People Park...and that it would start in two hours!

Ema hustled to hail a cab that would take her to the park, an activity that was complicated by almost being too fat in her waist and hips to squeeze into and out of the backseat of the car, but with the driver helping her (under the promise that she would give the man a $20 tip if Ema got there in time), she made it with 20 minutes to spare.

After some rushed paperwork, she pinned her number on her extra-large sweatshirt and took her place on stage where she saw stacks of pies, the food of choice for this contest. The rush to get here worked up an appetite for Ema so she was pretty confidant she would take home the prize money.

When the starting pistol fired, she dove into her pile of pies, scooping up pieces of each pie and shoveling them in her mouth. Obviously, crumbs and various fillings were smeared all over her face and top but Ema didn't have time to care, she needed to win!

Ema kept the speed on for most of the contest though near the end, she started to slow down until she slammed the last empty pie tin on the table and delivered a loud belch before laying back in her seat. Her stomach was hard as a rock as it jutted straight out of the waistband of her sweatpants and she was gasping for air, but it was the most fun she had in weeks, all she needed was her prize money.

Did she win?
142122.title: The Contest

1421221.content:
It took some time to decide who was the winner since Ema and another contestant managed to finish close to each other but after looking at the video recordings, they saw Ema finish just 3 seconds faster. Ema was still in a daze when the check was handed to her along with a pamphlet about other eating contests if she wanted to go pro. But instead of hanging around, she straight home and let her stomach digest everything.

The next day, she woke up on the couch and looked through the info they gave her. Apparently, there was going to be several more contests in the span of two months, each of them awarding a prize of at least 10 grand. Ema grunted as she leaned forward to pick up the check and looked at the amount as if this was all a dream.

She weighed her options: She could become a professional eater and save enough money to live a life of moderate luxury or she could stick with her original plan to find another job and keep the contests as nothing but a hobby she would occasionally indulge.

Her stomach interrupted her thought process and she heaved herself off the couch to clean out her kitchen. But when she finished, she decided to...
1421221.title: She won!

choices: Try something else (3, 4 or author's choice)
14212211.content:
Ema decided that she should enter all of the contests and make them her primary source of income. Ema looked over the pamphlet again and did the math: there were a total of 25 contests going on in the next two months (some of them taking place the day after a previous one), each a prize of $10,000. 10,000 multiplied by 25 is $250,000, which is double her annual salary as a detective! If she could win them all and saved at least half of each prize in the bank, she could have enough to last through any dry spells of contests, if there ever was anything like an off-season for eating. The pamphlet didn't go into that much of detail.

And with that, Ema's new plan started. Every day that she didn't have a contest to join, she spent most of her time training by frequenting all-you-can-eat buffets to have, quite literally, all she could eat with the rest of her free time spent shopping for what she needs (usually just food) and lounging about her apartment, waiting for her stomach to digest everything so she could eat more, either take-out or from her kitchen. On contest days, she wouldn't eat anything until the contest, letting her hunger be more motivation to tear into anything placed in front of her and never stop until she wins.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Two months later...

After the last contest, Ema waddled into her apartment, dropping the check by the door and plopped down on the couch. As she sat there to catch her breath and wipe the sweat from her forehead, she thought about how every thing in her world had changed. At first, she would barely win or come in second place but as her "training" and competitions continued, her appetite increased so Ema started winning five minutes before the rest, then ten minutes, and then twenty minutes with room to spare for some of the food the disqualified contestants didn't touch. Of course, the increase in Ema's appetite was due to Ema growing fatter until her current weight of 400 pounds, most of her new fat went straight to her stomach, hips and butt.

Outside of her weight gain, Ema looked like a different woman than before, making some changes out of apathy. Her wardrobe was nothing but sweatsuits as she preferred something that could stretch when she was eating and plenty of them have permanent stains from her meals. Ema also let her hair grow out long enough to reach her lower back and she rarely wears makeup as it tends to smear when she's eating.

Ema grumbled when she got a look at herself in a mirror on her way to the kitchen. She'd have to get a haircut soon as she found the hair catching in some of her folds and when it falls in front of her face when she's trying to eat to be annoying. Also, she noticed that her sweatpants were getting too tight again, so she'd have to find a bigger pair.

But Ema has a bigger problem. As her weight sky-rocketed, it was obviously getting harder to move, both in her apartment and outside. In fact, she was almost late to her most recent eating contest as she had to ride the train and then walk since she was too big for a cab.

Clearly, she had to do something. It turns out there were more contests year-round and Ema doesn't want to miss a single one for the money and all of the fun she had in each contest. She racked her brain trying to figure out what to do. She could go to a gym, either to (1) strengthen her muscles or (2) shed some of the weight. Or she try something else like (3) using her scientific equipment to make something that could solve the problem or (4) just ask for help from someone.

What does she do?

((The "try something else" option can also be an author's choice. If you want any of the 5 choices, please make room for others to write one of the other paths.))
14212211.title: Go pro

142122111.content:
All right, so what does Ema do?

Does she work out enough to move around easier while eating enough to not lose any weight?

Or does she try to slim down enough so she can fit into cars and yet still have an advantage at her contests?

Ema continues to procastinate and just eat

Ema decided to use the downtime before the next contest to start building enough muscle to move around without losing any weight. "Good thing I'm already dressed to work out. I'll start going tomorrow, but first, it's time for my snack" said Ema as she grabbed her phone to order 4 extra large pizzas while putting a ham in the oven. "No sense in starving myself even if I want to tone up, scientifically speaking."

The next day at the nearest gym Ema could find, she went in to sign up only to stomp out 20 minutes later, every fold of fat jiggling wildly as she did. The reason why is that everyone at the gym couldn't stop making rude comments about her weight and instead of instructing her on how to build muscle, they were trying to make her hire a trainer to monitor her diet and stick to fat-burning techniques.

"The nerve of those guys! If they don't want to help me, I'll do it myself!" fumed Ema as she squeezed into a seat on the train to go to a department store. Once there, she bought several sets of barbells and a machine to do leg lifts, paying extra for her purchase to be delivered at her apartment, along with putting it together AND taking her in the truck with them (a request that concerned the employees if the truck could hold everything with her until Ema dropped an extra $500 on the table.)

After everything is said and done, Ema had a small personal gym ready to go. Though all of movement made her sweaty and tired to think about doing anything so she settled ordering a heap of take-out food for her lunch, after-lunch meal, pre-dinner snack, dinner, dessert and her midnight snack until she fell asleep on the couch, the TV left on.

At the contest...

Who was it?

Is it Franziska von Karma, the "sister" to Ema's idol Miles Edgeworth and famed prosecutor?

14212211111122.title: Franziska von Karma or Angel Starr

142122111111221.content:
Ema searched the park grounds for anyone that could possibly be the biggest competition and when she reached where the stage where the contestants were going to be seated, she saw a blue-haired girl around her age waiting there, with her eyes closed and her arms crossed while clutching a whip as if she's growing impatient about something.

"But she's not as big as me. What were those guys talking about?" Ema mumbled while walking closer to eye this new person. When Ema moved around the speaker, her mouth opened with shock as she saw why people would think that Ema might be in trouble this time. Ema may have a bigger chest or belly but this girl had the biggest ass she had ever seen. It was twice the size of Ema's and Ema is a girl who can take up an entire bench when she sits down.

The most amazing thing was that this lady was still wearing a skirt but before Ema could make any calculations about what size it would be, how much it must cost or even how can this woman even stand or think about bending over, the lass in question noticed Ema staring at her and promptly whipped her, her mounds of fat softened the blow but it still stung and unnerved Ema enough to yelp in pain.

How appropriate that you'd be here...but you are right, I, Franziska von Karma, prosecutor prodigy am entering this contest and shall achieve a perfect victory." replied Franziska with her usual amount of arrogance.

1421221111112211.content:
A short time later the contest was getting ready to commence and all of the contestants were in their seats on stage though they had to place extra chairs for Ema and Franziska, who were sitting right next to each other, as a single folding chair couldn't obviously be comfortable for the two obese women. Ema wound up needing three chairs and Franziska kept whipping the stagehands for more chairs but they ran out after giving her a fourth chair and so folds of her fat was over the ends of the two outer chairs and the prosecutor's mood remained sour as she kept squirming to get comfortable.

Ema couldn't help but smirk at Franziska's misfortune but the blue-haired woman caught her and said "Hmph! Still have no manners after my lashings, I see. But I guess that's to be expected from someone who let themselves go like you, Miss Ema Skye."

"At least I let myself go in the right places to win something like this." retorted Ema as she patted her stomach "Try not to blame your loss on not having enough chairs to hold your giant butt."

Franziska struggled to reach it but her fat prevented her from bending farther than several inches and she gave up after several tries and wiped the sweat off her forehead. Then she came up with an idea. "If you are so confident, Miss Ema Skye, why not make this contest more interesting?"

"What do you mean?" asked Ema

"I mean a wager. A von Karma always seizes the perfect victory and I have no need for the money from these foolish games, but when you lose your winning streak, you will also never enter another contest again no matter how much you need the money...or the food." declared Franziska. "But...if you do manage to beat me, you can name your own condition. It can be money, a new home, anything. Do we have a deal?" she concluded as she stretched out a chubby hand towards Ema.

Ema shook her hand and said "You're on! I hope you are ready for what I have in mind, von Karma!"

Moments later, the whistle was blown signaling the start of the contest and the contestants tore into the food of choice, pies. One by one and sometimes by waves, people started to bow out voluntary or when they run away to the nearest place to vomit until there was only two people left: Ema and Franziska.

Both of the bloated beauties were still eating at a break-neck pace and when one of them gained an advantage, the other caught up soon enough. Ema was caught off-guard by the fact that this is the first time in a long time that she didn't have a giant lead but she remained focused.

But who was the winner?

"Impossible!" shouted Franziska after finishing her last plate but her outburst was because she wasn't fast enough as Ema beat her by 30 seconds and was declared the winner.

"Take THAT!" exclaimed Ema, not hesitating to rub in her victory to von Karma before belching out loud. "Ooh. I shouldn't have had those hot dogs before hand. But I didn't expect anyone like you to give me a run for my money."

Franziska could only tremble in rage, causing her body to jiggle uncontrollably before saying "How can this be?! I let my perfect figure go and I still lose?!" She continued to pout until eventually she calmed down and then looking at Ema and saying "I admit defeat...for now. But you shall lose eventually like a foolish fool like you always will. Now what do you want as your reward so I may leave?"

Ema thought about what exactly she could ask from the fat prosecutor. She was well-off now financially though it could never hurt to have more money. But the other thing Ema has on her mind is simply social interaction. Ever since Ema got booted from the force, her entire life has been nothing but eating, sleeping and more recently, working out to make sure she's not immobile. No one really called her and when she went out in public, most of the people stared or made snide comments about her weight. What option does Ema pick?

142122111111221112.content:
Ema just couldn't get it out of her head that what she really needs right now is companionship as she is financially secure (though that remains to be seen if she keeps gaining weight) and told Franziska as such. The German prosecutor couldn't believe it.

"That's it? For me to be your friend? What a foolish, foolish request for a fool to make!" said Franziska, who couldn't help but laugh.

Franziska got used to being so "informal" and acting more casual around Ema while Ema got used to Franziska being so stubborn and competitive, especially when they were eating. From time to time, Franziska suddenly turned their normal dinner into a repeat of the contest where they first met and while it was mostly the same result, Ema was occasionally caught off-guard (or filled up earlier in the day) that Franziska won a few times to her delight.

These impromptu contests and their appetites in general caused both of the girls to gain weight. It wasn't until recently that Ema convinced Franziska to check her weight (clinging to a part of her denial/reluctance to accept that she's overweight) and it was revealed that she was 400 pounds which meant more weight to her gigantic rear and the woes from being so fat was getting to her like it was getting harder to move herself around, especially through narrow halls and doorways. Several times, Franziska had found herself stuck and relied on Ema to push her out which always made the two girls blush when their flesh touched each other (especially when Ema had to place both hands on Franziska's ass.)

Because of this, Ema was just about ready to have Franziska work out with her, assuming she could find room for the both of them to be in comfortably. Also Ema finally got her hair cut to the style she had before she started gaining weight and started to wear makeup again when she went out with Franziska, who was also willing to set her up with the same plus-size clothing supplier that the prosecutor uses to wear something other than stretched-out sweats all the time.

Moments later, Ema heard a cry of "EMA! COME HERE!" and lumbered off into the hallway towards her friend to find out what the outburst was for.

Ema always wondered what was the largest size of clothes Franziska's plus-size supplier could get and judging from Franziska's black skirt, the young prosecutor had reached the limit since it didn't cover her mammoth ass completely and with every step she took, Ema caught glimpses of Franziska's black panties not to mention the skirt was on so tightly that Ema worried that it would be destroyed if Franziska bent forward. Yet she couldn't help but think that it wouldn't be the worst thing in the world if that happened.

Just then, Franziska stopped at the end of the hallway and Ema thought she was stuck again and was about to place her hands on Franziska's body when the blue-haired woman turned around to look at Ema and said "About what just happened..."

What happened next?
1421221111112211121.title: Franziska got stuck in the hallway

14212211111122111211.content:
Franziska paused to collect her thoughts then said "What happened just now was embarrassing, the very idea that I, a von Karma, would get stuck and ask for help...But when you were helping me, there was a part that felt...well, good."

Ema could easily deduce which part she was talking about and waited for her friend to continue.

"In fact, every time you had to touch me and push me, it just felt so right. It's so foolish of me but I kept thinking about you, about us together, something more than just friends...If I said that right. I would like that to happen outside of a dream..." Franziska finished before going to Ema's living room, trembling a bit after she stopped being so aggressive for a moment and confessed her feelings. Ema followed her into the living room, digesting what she said. More than friends, like lovers? Ema had also fantasized about the two of them a little (like right now when she was watching Franziska walk in front of her) but was it time to swear off guys altogether?

Then Ema remembered what started down her path of obesity: the depression combined from messing up the test to be a forensic investigator so many times and that prosecutor, Klavier Gavin teasing her so much. Well, now she's fat with a hobby that pays far more than any police work and a friend willing to be with her as part of a couple. Ema made up her mind and waddled over to the couch Franziska was standing next to.

"Franziska, here's what I think" Ema said before embracing Franziska in a squishy hug, their large stomachs bumping into each other, and kissed the blue haired prosecutor on the lips. Franziska's eyes widened before taking the impulsive "answer" in stride and shifted her bulk so Ema would sit on the couch and Franziska laid on top of her, kissing Ema deeply with her tongue while Ema squeezed a part of Franziska's wide ass.

The two's moment was ruined however by the couch's legs breaking, sending the two down to the ground.

"That is certainly quite the answer" Franziska said with a smile as they try to pick themselves off the floor.
"Next time, let's make sure something can hold the two of us before we try that again." Ema groaned, rubbing her butt.

1423.content:
It dawned on Ema that a possible reason Klavier annoyed her so much, was because he was attracted to her. So Ema figured, if she were bigger, maybe Klavier wouldn't annoy her so much.
She giggled. She wasn't 100% sure, but it would be a intresting experiment. Ema wolfed down her dough cakes in record time.When she finished, she was happy to see her stomach looked a little bigger.
(Hmm this could be fun, I better get some more!).

She ate constanly through out the day, and though Klavier gave her some strange looks, she simply smiled.
After work, she went for some fast food. She ordered several of the largest meals she could.

14231.content:
After a week of her gaining, Ema had gotten quite large. She had gone up a few pants sizes, and already her huge waist-clinging jeans were starting to rip. She had a huge flabby gut that pushed about three feet outward, and it made her entire body look almost spherical. She had a nice round cherubic face with big red cheeks and a double chin. Ema's giant jiggly breasts were barely confined in her uniform, on which two of the buttons have already snapped off. By now, Klavier seemed to have stopped even bothering being seen with her. Although this was what Ema planned...all this new fat on her body was making life difficult.

She had not only gotten slower and lazier, but it took alot of effort just to stand up now. 'Maybe I'm overdoing it...' Ema thought as she patted her belly, sending ripples flowing through her flabby flesh. Ema really wasn't sure what to do now...
14231.title: A week later

choices: Go on a diet and lose the weight
142312.content:
Ema had accidentaly overheard Klavier just then, talking with another officer:

"Doesn't Detective Skye seem, well, a little different nowadays?" the officer had asked, "I mean, she has more of a... er... commanding presence than usual."

"Well, between you and me," Klavier responded, "I think that she's more enjoyable in her present state. The way her body wiggles when she walks around is so... rythmic. So... appealing..."

Ema didn't hear the rest of the conversation, since she was concentrating on what Klavier had just confessed: he actually liked her fat! She was so depressed that she ate through 5 more bags of fried treats than usual that day.

In fact, the shocking news that Klavier liked her fat caused a depression-fueled, week-long binge that pushed Ema's weight upward to 300 pounds. On the inside, she was struggling with her feelings: on one hand, she felt mortified that her plan to drive Klavier off had completely backfired, and wanted to get started on a diet. On the other hand, Ema felt proud that Klavier liked her fat, and she was even thinking of hooking up with him. Should Ema...?
142312.title: She Heard it On the Grapevine...

choices: Ema still frighten continues to gain but a slower pace
Ema has private conversation with Klavier
14232.content:
Ema giggled with a bit of childhood glee as she gave her full stomach a gentle pat.

"Who knows maybe this experiment won't be so bad, especially if it will get that glimerious would-be rock star of a prosecutor off my back." Ema mumbled, unaware, or perhaps just to mock the man, that Klavier was already an established rock star and that she had once again used the word(?) "glimorous" instead of "glamorous" when speaking about him.

Regardless the young detective decided to go to bed early today so she could rest from her long eating spree.

Later that night as Ema slept she began to toss slightly around shifting her body from time to time. If she were awake she would've estimated that the overeating was starting to affect her system but ala the poor woman wasn't and as she tossed and turned her brain began to engulf her deeper into her dream...

Ema wasn't sure where she was until she heard the sound of several dozen voices and the familiar sound of crunching that arose whenever she'd eat her favorite snacks. Ema then realized she was in the ever familiar courtroom she'd been to many a time. As she continued to munch away at her snacks she noticed defense attorney Apollo Justice (with magician Trucy Wright by his side) and that man...Klavier Gavin explaining the current legal case to all in attendance.

Ema couldn't quite make out what Gavin was saying, something about a Van Latte who was found dead inside his coffee shop...or something close to that nature, Ema wasn't too sure and her continuous eating wasn't helping her hearing.

In any case a short time later she was called up to the wittiness stand, having finished her snacks she threw the empty bag away before walking over to the stand. Amazingly she was able to give a detailed testimony to both Justice and Gavin but she also noticed she was at her normal weight despite the eating feast from the other night.

Ema thought of it as weird since she was sure she'd be at least a bit chunkier then before but dismissed the thought as Apollo began his cross-examination.

As Justice pressed on her statements she did her best to back them up as best she could. But something strange was happening within her, she could feel it, whenever Apollo pressed she felt her clothes a bit tighter. No one else seem to catch on, even Justice who had a "gift" for seeing people's nervous-born traits.

Regardless the pressing continued and the pressing on Ema's clothes continued as well. Was she actually swelling with each of her statements? She wasn't sure but she sure did feel like she was.

Minutes went on and by now Ema was definitely fatter to a certain degree, not overweight but she was "heavier" then before but just like when this strange occurrence had began no one seem to take notice and it was as if she had always been of that body weight.

Ema was a bit taken back when Apollo loudly objected to her last statement. The young man stated his piece and just as Ema was going to respond she heard a loud rumbling sound.

Quick-witted Apollo stood silent as he, Trucy, Gavin, and everyone else heard the sound come from Ema's belly. Shocked and wide-eyed she blushed heavily before mentally telling her stomach to shut up. But her belly would have none of it as she winced in what appeared to be a sting of pain.

She moaned in what appeared to be sudden agony as her stomach rumbled one last time before literally erupting out of her uniform! The rest of her body soon followed in her belly's example as a sea of flab exited or perhaps in this case became Ema's form.

Panic-stricken Ema could barely make out Apollo asking Trucy if this was one of her magic tricks which the much younger girl denied having any part in. Justice then wasted no time grabbing Trucy by the arm and leading her out of the courtroom as Ema continued to grow in size and weight. Klavier as well knew when to make a hasty exit once a "performance" had gone bad but not before the elderly Judge forced the musician to carry him to safety, Ema wasn't sure if Gavin was annoyed at the prospect of carrying the judge or brushed it aside as he just like everyone else wanted to get the hell out of the room that was being shallowed up by her ever-growing blubber.

Move and more she grew and Ema could feel her sides begin to press against the walls of the courtroom.

"Please come back! Anyone, Apollo, Trucy, Mr. Wright, ...Klavier! Please help me!" she shouted as best she could as Ema's fatten self continued to overtake more and more of the courthouse, her girth having escaped the confines of the courtroom.

The courthouse was just about to give up to Ema's massiveness as the young detective began to feel her head sinking the flab around her face. As a tear came down her right eye a vision of Ema's older sister Lana appeared in her mind. Ema mumbled Lana's name just as the courthouse's walls came down and her mind went blank...

With a ear-bursting scream Ema jumped from her sleeping position, her heart beating like crazy as the cold sweat poured down her forehead.

Looking down at her slightly plump stomach, Ema recalled her nightmare. Giving it a soft pat she stood up and walk out of her room toward the kitchen for a glass of water.

"Maybe I should slow down this weight-gain of mine, take it nice and easy...no need to rush and I don't want "that" (recalling her dream) to happen."

Ema figured it was more than likely impossible for her dream to become a reality but she was so shaken up she didn't want to take any chances.

"Or maybe I could have a talk with Klavier tomorrow and see what his opinion is."

Downing the last of the water in her glass, she walked off back toward her bedroom. Tomorrow was another day.

151.title: Pearl Fey

choices: Phoenix, Maya, and Pearl investigate the identity of the female spirit.
Phoenix and Maya try to cheer up Pearl by taking her out to eat.
Pearl goes to bed that night, but wakes up in the morning even fatter!
1511.content:
Pearl emerged from the channeling of a spirit, rather tired for some reason. Although very hard channelings would cause many other spirit mediums to faint, Pearl was usually able to return to her body without one ounce of fatigue. So her sudden tiredness disturbed her a bit…

Pearl looked down at herself and her eyes grew big with shock. Pearl was normally short and skinny for her age, but now her midsection looked incredibly pudgy. She rushed over to a mirror in the corner of the room. Her reflection looked normal, but from the side view it looked like she had a pillow stuffed in her acolyte clothes. She stuck one hand under her robes and felt cool, squishy flesh.

Just then the door opened. Maya walked in, and her jaw fell to the floor when she saw her cousin. “PEARLY? What happened to you?!”

Pearl was uncomfortable with her sudden weight gain and her cousin’s strange actions. Tears started to well up in her eyes. “Mystic Maya, what’s going oonnnnnnnnnnnnn?” she cried.

As chubby little Pearl stood their crying Phoenix came into the room. “Pearl, you’re back—WHOA!”

Maya crouched down to comfort Pearl. “Shh, Pearly, it’s okay. What was the last thing you remember doing?”

Pearl sniffed. “I-I-I w-was just training. I channeled a spirit and then…well, I woke up just now.”

“So she was channeling a spirit” Phoenix said. “That might explain why she was gone.”

“G-gone, Mr. Nick?”

“Oh Pearls, you’ve been missing for almost a day and a half. We were starting to get worried about you when you didn’t show up last night.”

“What was I doing?”

“If you were in the middle of a channeling this whole weekend, I might have a fair guess of what you were doing. Well, not exactly you, of course, but someone else.” Phoenix opened up a page in the newspaper. The picture on it showed a plump teenage girl running away from a buffet with an ice cream cone and a chicken leg. Although the food stains around her lips cloaked her face, it was easy to tell that her voluptuous body was stuffed into small robes, and her hair was done up in Pearl’s signature pretzel ponytails.

“That’s that crazy girl who was eating all the food in the buffets and stores, right?” Maya asked.

“Yeah. The police could never manage to capture her; she was amazingly fast for her size. It makes more sense if this girl was a spirit that Pearls accidentally channeled. Looks like she was dying to eat some food again.”

Pearl, growing very afraid, started to cry again. Maya tried to comfort her. “It’s okay, Pearly. You know that a spirit can’t harm the medium it’s possessing, right?”

“Yeah, that’s true,” Phoenix added. “Although in this case it seems that all the food this spirit ate had to go somewhere, and unfortunately Pearls got left with it.” Phoenix and Maya tried to cheer Pearls up. They laid her on the couch, turned on her favorite TV program and even got her a bowl of her favorite ice cream, which was almost a disastrous move.

“Don’t worry Pearl,” Phoenix said. “I’m sure I can figure out who this rouge spirit is, and Maya could find out ways to make sure this never happens again.”

“OK,” Pearl said, starting to get a little more cheerful.
1511.title: What happened when she was possessed?

choices: They take the train to Kurain Village.
Pearl is hungry, and asks Maya if they can stop for breakfast.
15113.content:
Pearl found that her new chubby tummy wasn’t that bad after all. Sure, she had never weighed this much before, but Pearl thought it made her look more grown up, and her belly jiggled whenever she poked it.

Pearl had been snacking on treats Maya had been trying to cheer her up with all day, and when Phoenix brought Chinese take-out for dinner, Pearl ate more then her usual serving. She felt sleepy after this, so Maya went and tucked her into bed.

Pearl couldn’t remember if she had any dreams that night. There was a strange, familiar sensation of flashing lights, but it happened so quick Pearl couldn’t tell whether she had dreamed it or imagined it.

Pearl stirred. She usually woke up before morning light to train before breakfast, but the sun was just rising and golden light came through the window. Pearl yawned, feeling slightly uncomfortable for some reason. She lifted her head, and gasped when she couldn’t over the mound in front of her.

She got up and dashed to the mirror in the corner of the room. Pearl was now chubby and plump all over. A large tummy poked out from her robes and over her waist. Her hips, tushie, and love handles were all flabbier, and her legs and arms looked a bit plumper. Her belly was the biggest thing, as it looked like she had swallowed two couch cushions.

She cried again, tears brawling from her face. Just as she started to cry Phoenix and Maya rushed into the room. “Oh, no,” Phoenix said. “I was afraid this had happened again.”

“Mystic Mayaaaa! Mr. Nick! What’s wrong with me?” Pearl sobbed huge, fat tears.

“It’s okay, Pearly,” Maya said, hugging her cousin. “You’re safe now, that’s all that matters.”

Phoenix unfolded a newspaper. “The moment I saw the early release of today’s newspaper, I knew I should be worried.” The front page showed a picture of that mysterious fat girl running away from a mini-mart, with the headline FAT GIRL STRIKES AGAIN. “When Pearls fell asleep, it looks like the spirit overtook her body again.”

“This is bad, Nick.” Maya had a disturbed look on her face. “There’s no way that a spirit is supposed to posses a spirit medium against their will. This must be a powerful spirit, and since Pearly channeled her, the spirit must see Pearly as a portal to the real world and it could have power over her whenever she gets unconscious.”

“Isn’t there any way we can protect her?”

“It’s going to take some powerful techniques, and I don’t know any off hand. Come on, Pearly, we’re going to go home to Kurain Village. The mediums there will know what to do.”

Maya got Pearl cleaned and dressed. The tubby child was too big for her small robes, as puffy skin poked out from any hole available. Maya and Peal walked to the train station.
15113.title: It happened again...

151131.content:
Maya and Pearl got off the train at Kurain. “See, Pearly? We made it here safe, and there’s no way a spirit could harm you while you are here.” Maya thought back to a disturbing case that had taken place here when a spirit had supposedly killed someone, but the real killer was someone pretending to be a spirit.

Pearl followed Maya up the steps of Fey Manor. The little girl had finally come to peace with her situation, but she stumbled a bit as she walked, because of her unaccustomed new weight.

“Some of the head spirit mediums should be conducting training in the practice halls,” Maya said. “We’ll get you some help, Pearly.”

“Ho ho ho ho ho! My, my, If it isn’t young Maya Fey.”

Maya turned to look at a short, stout woman behind them. “Sister Bikini! What are you doing down here? Shouldn’t you be at Hazakura Temple?”

“Oh, don’t worry about the temple. I have Iris watching over it. Oh, you didn’t hear the good news? Because Iris was an unwilling accomplice to that murder, and she has been on her best behavior in detention, she’s able to serve out the rest of her sentence under house arrest at the Hazakura property. Anyho, they just wanted to come down to Kurain to help teach some new advanced channeling techniques. Who’s that behind you?”

“Oh, this is my cousin Pearl. You should remember her from our visit.”

“Oh, dear me, yes! I would forget my undergarments if Iris didn’t fold them up and place them on my bed in the morning! Ha ha ha ho ho ho!”

Maya tried not to cringe at the sight of that image.

“Well, Pearl seems to have grown a bit since I saw her last. I always say, people grow out before they grow up! Except, it never really worked for me…oh well.”

“That’s why we’re here, actually.” Maya handed Bikini copies of the newspaper articles Phoenix had made. “It seems Pearl’s been possessed at spirit that indirectly causes Pearly to gain weight.”

Bikini looked through the clippings. “Tut, tut! Can’t have a rogue spirit plaguing our young acolyte, can we? I have a few ideas I think might work…”
151131.title: At Kurain

choices: Pearl appears to be fine, but slowly gains weight.
1511311.content:
Bikini led Maya and Pearl to a private channeling chamber. Maya was very confused. “You think the way to protect Pearly from this spirit is by making her gain weight?”

“Not physical weight, my dear, spiritual weight. There have been a few times before when mediums have gained weight due to prolonged exposure to a certain spirit. It’s one of the very few physical harms that spirit can make on the body they are possessing. It has to do with something about spirits can only return to the beyond they way they came out, so if they eat any food while being channeled it gets left with the medium. Sometimes these things go right over my head.”

“But how exactly will this technique help Pearly?” Maya asked.

“It’s simple, really. We’re just going to make Pearl’s spirit bigger than her body. I know it sounds strange, but it makes a little sense if you think about it in vague terms. A human spirit usually looks exactly like its body’s physical appearance, barring death. Right now Pearl’s spirit is currently as big as she is, so we’re just going to plump up Pearl’s spirit so that it looks bigger than her physical form. It’s like shoving a cork into a hole. The spirit still fits within the medium, but from the other side the rogue spirits can see that there is too much soul for one person, and it deters them away because there’s no room for them to sneak in and possess the medium. Follow me so far?”

“I think so…” Maya grimaced. “How abort you, Pearly?’

“I think it’ll work, Mystic Maya.”

“Alrighty, then! One Spiritual-Weight-Gain-Technique coming right up!”

Bikini had Pearl sit in the middle of the room. The tubby girl watched Maya and Bikini rushed around setting up candles and bowls of food in a circle around her. The food was important, Bikini said, because it would be used to fatten up Pearl’s spirit. The bowls had to be placed in a complex arrangement so that the starches balanced the meats; the vegetables were directly across from the fruits, etc.

“What is Pearl’s favorite food?” Sister Bikini asked.

“Chocolate chip cookies!” Pearl exclaimed, hopping up and down in her seat.

“Gentle, girl, gentle…” Bikini said, signaling Pearl to sit still. “It’s important that you don’t move during the process.” Bikini placed a bowl of cookies in front of Pearl. She sprinkled it with some water and drew a mystic symbol on the side of the bowl, as she had been doing with every bowl. “This will be the focal point for the technique, then, that we end with to return Pearl’s spirit to her body. You have the defenses ready, Maya?”

“Yes Sister Bikini.”

“Good, we’ll begin then…Dash it all, where are the matches?” Bikini and Maya looked around the room frantically for matches. When none were found, they ran out to a supply closet to get some, leaving Pearl alone in the room. She glanced at the bowl of cookies in front of her. Although she had gained weight over night, she hadn’t eaten a single thing so far today. She leaned over ate grabbed some cookies and ate them. “Yummy!” She was about to eat the rest when she heard Maya and Bikini return, so she sat back and acted like she hadn’t moved at all.

“There we go, now we can begin! I’ll start the technique, Maya, and you make sure Pearl’s spirit doesn’t leave this room.”

Sister Bikini light all the candles that were placed between the bowls of food, and then sat back and did some chanting. Pearl felt very sleepy, and then she realized she was floating up away from her body. The light from the candles flared, and the image of a Magatama appeared around Pearl’s spirit, keeping her in one spot in mid-air. As Maya concentrated on keeping Pearl in suspension, Bikini went around to each of the bowls in turn. She took the candle beside each bowl and used it to burn the food within that bowl. The food would be completely consumed by flame, leaving a spectral image of the food that would rise up towards Pearl’s spirit. The spectral food would combine with Pearl’s spirit, making it just a bit bigger every time. By the time Bikini reached the bowl of cookies, Pearl’s spirit looked about twenty pounds heavier than her body.

As the cookies caught fire, Pearl could feel a burning sensation in her stomach. But wait, that was back in her body. Pearl’s portly spirit fell back into the girl’s form. Although the spirit was now much bigger than her body, all of the ectoplasmic wisps soon settled in their proper places. Pearl opened her eyes and blinked.

“Hee hee!” Bikini giggled. “Technique successful. Not a thing out of line!”

“Are you okay, Pearly?”

“I feel alright, Mystic Maya.”
1511311.title: Spiritual-Weight-Gain-Technique

choices: "The spirit will not stop the gain until it is complete...so, no way to tell."
15113112.content:
As Maya and Bikini were busy clearing up the tools used for the Spiritual Weight gain Technique, Pearl Fey felt...odd. Not 'bad' odd, but odd nonetheless. "Mystic Mayaaaaaaaa, I feel...full."

"Full? How? Your spirit should've stopped all of that by now..." Maya Fey said. Pearl hiccuped, her belly jiggled, and it seemed to pooch out a bit more. Maya looked on as Pearl hiccuped three more times, adding another three pounds to her frame. Her eyes grew bigger than dinner plates at Pearl's sudden expansion. "Wha-what?! That technique should've stopped the weight gain..."

Pearl hiccuped again, but this time it looked like it added 5 pounds onto her already plump body, mostly in her thighs. They pushed tightly against her robes, the sides tearing a little. Her belly was beginning to strain the fabric of her robes, the purplish fabric clinging tightly to the growing dome. Sister Bikini had just noticed it, and was quickly rifling through a spiritual guidebook, trying to figure out what went wrong. Her pupils shrank as she read the page.

"Uh oh...I think we used the wrong seal."

"Wrong seal?" Maya asked confused, looking to Pearly as the younger girl hiccuped again, gaining another pound. "Wrong seal?! Pearly's getting fatter...because of a wrong seal?!"

"Yeah...the one for Spiritual Weight Gain technique and the Fulfilling Catalyst technique are on the same page..."

"Sister Bikini, what does the Fulfilling Catalyst do*hic*?" Pearl asked, holding her belly as it pooched out another inch.

"To be frank, it makes the actual body large enough for the spirit to feel comfortable, which normally is only ten or twenty pounds to gain. Which is why you're hiccuping," she added, as Pearl hiccuped yet again. Her face was looking pudgier than before, "And also why you're growing. Because we fattened up your spirit to be about twenty pounds heavier...you have to gain enough weight to satisfy it. There's a guide here for that..."

Pearl hiccuped a couple more times, with Maya biting her nails out of her nervousness. Finally, with a sigh, Sister Bikini closed the book. "There is a BIG problem..."

"A big problem? How big?" Maya asked sharply, shifting her gaze towards Pearl. Pearl's breasts, no matter her age, had gone up to C-cups in normal standards. They rested atop a wonderfully shaped belly and thunderous thighs. Bikini scratched the back of her head.

"Uh...big. As it turns out, a spirit the size of the person's body will make the person gain ten or twenty pounds. For every five pounds the spirit gains, the body must...gain...ten...more..." Maya's eyes went wide again. Pearl started crying, realizing that she was going to be over forty pounds heavier soon.

"Mystic Mayaaaaa....I don't wanna be huge!" the young girl cried, hiccuping more as the tears flowed. Her belly fat flowed out and began to cause small tears in her pinkish robes. At being close to 230 lbs. now, Pearl was now fatter than most kids her age by a large margin. She sobbed into her hands, her face ruddy with tears. "I'm already so *hic* fat now!"

Maya took Sister Bikini by the shoulders and shook her hard. "Listen...what is the final weight that Pearly will be before her spirit is satisfied?"

"Uh....it says here..."
15113112.title: Big Screw-Up
